title: IBM bullish on new Ahmedabad, Kochi labs, looks to double hiring this year
description: IBM's India network spans five labs, including its Bengaluru HQ and facilities in Pune and Hyderabad. Notably, the recent additions in Kochi and Ahmedabad are fueling advancements in WatsonX, IBM's AI platform.
